00041 Table::Table(PropertiesPtr &props, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager,
00042              Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, const String &name)
00043   : m_props(props), m_comm(conn_manager->get_comm()),
00044     m_conn_manager(conn_manager), m_hyperspace(hyperspace), m_stale(true) {
00045 
00046   m_timeout_ms = props->get_i32("Hypertable.Request.Timeout");
00047 
00048   initialize(name.c_str());
00049 
00050   m_range_locator = new RangeLocator(props, m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace,
00051                                      m_timeout_ms);
00052 
00053   m_app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(props->
00054                                      get_i32("Hypertable.Client.Workers"));
00055 }

00070 void Table::initialize(const char *name) {
00071   String tablefile = "/hypertable/tables/"; tablefile += name;
00072   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00073   uint64_t handle;
00074   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00075   String errmsg;
00076 
00077   // TODO: issue 11
00081   try {
00082     handle = m_hyperspace->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00083                                 null_handle_callback);
00084   }
00085   catch (Exception &e) {
00086     if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00087       HT_THROW2(Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND, e, "");
00088     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Unable to open Hyperspace table file '%s'",
00089                tablefile.c_str());
00090   }
00091 
00092   m_table.set_name(name);
00093 
00097   value_buf.clear();
00098   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00099 
00100   m_table.id = atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00101 
00105   value_buf.clear();
00106   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "schema", value_buf);
00107 
00108   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00109 
00110   m_schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)value_buf.base,
00111       strlen((const char *)value_buf.base), true);
00112 
00113   if (!m_schema->is_valid()) {
00114     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", m_schema->get_error_string());
00115     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00116   }
00117 
00118   m_table.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00119   m_stale = false;
00120 }

00122 
00123 void Table::refresh() {
00124   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00125   HT_ASSERT(m_table.name);
00126   m_stale = true;
00127   initialize(m_table.name);
00128 }

00131 void Table::get(TableIdentifierManaged &ident_copy, SchemaPtr &schema_copy) {
00132   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00133   ident_copy = m_table;
00134   schema_copy = m_schema;
00135 }

00138 void
00139 Table::refresh(TableIdentifierManaged &ident_copy, SchemaPtr &schema_copy) {
00140   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00141   HT_ASSERT(m_table.name);
00142   m_stale = true;
00143   initialize(m_table.name);
00144   ident_copy = m_table;
00145   schema_copy = m_schema;
00146 }

00153 TableMutator *
00154 Table::create_mutator(uint32_t timeout_ms, uint32_t flags,
00155                       uint32_t flush_interval_ms) {
00156   uint32_t timeout = timeout_ms ? timeout_ms : m_timeout_ms;
00157 
00158   if (flush_interval_ms) {
00159     return new TableMutatorShared(m_props, m_comm, this, m_range_locator,
00160                                   m_app_queue, timeout, flush_interval_ms, flags);
00161   }
00162   return new TableMutator(m_props, m_comm, this, m_range_locator, timeout, flags);
00163 }

00166 TableScanner *
00167 Table::create_scanner(const ScanSpec &scan_spec, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00168                       bool retry_table_not_found) {
00169   return new TableScanner(m_comm, this, m_range_locator, scan_spec,
00170                           timeout_ms ? timeout_ms : m_timeout_ms,
00171                           retry_table_not_found);
00172 }
